channel.title: Welcome on Philippe Béliveau
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on Philippe Béliveau

item.title: AI Career Path Platform
item.description:
A platform built to recommend and visualize youth career paths using graph neural networks and language models, hosted on AWS.

Technologies used: Python, Next.js, AWS, Pinecone, Hugging Face, MLflow.

item.title: Time Series Modeling for Synthetic Relational Database Generation
item.description:
This research project explores synthetic data generation using advanced variants of GANs applied to relational-sequential time series data, extending the Row-Conditional Tabular GAN (RCTGAN).

We designed three architectures:

  • Sequential RCTGAN using LSTMs to capture temporal dynamics
  • Mini-batch GAN inspired by DoppelGANger to improve long-sequence realism
  • FFT-Enhanced GAN leveraging frequency-domain signals to enrich temporal dependencies

We applied our models to the Rossmann dataset, evaluated autocorrelation, cross-correlation, and parent-child metadata consistency, and achieved improvements over baseline CTGAN models in preserving long-term structure.

item.title: About
item.description:
With a background in data science and economics, I’ve conducted applied research in generative AI and time series forecasting, alongside real-world business roles such as AI product ownership and cash flow analytics.

I’m particularly passionate about deep learning, sequential decision-making, and building models that reflect the operational realities of users. I thrive in unstructured environments where technical curiosity meets real business value.
